snippet: A measure passed by the Senate on Monday would require the Federal Aviation Administration to give unmanned aerial vehicles, more commonly known as drones, expanded access to America's airways.
abstract: A measure passed by the Senate on Monday would require the Federal Aviation Administration to give unmanned aerial vehicles, more commonly known as drones, expanded access to America's airways.

headline.main: Among Liberties Advocates, Outrage Over Expanded Use of Drones
